item.description:
Common Ground - New Haven Ecology Project 

 358 Springside Avenue | New Haven | CT | 06515

Saturday, March 24, 2012

 Maple Syrup Festival and Pancake Brunch, 11:00 AM - 2:00 PM


Just as winter begins to give way to spring, the New England forest gives us the sweetest of gifts-- maple syrup! We invite families to join us for a celebration of the end of winter, and to learn about all about maple sugaring. See our tapped trees, taste raw sap, and sample fresh maple syrup. Learn about our wood-fired evaporator and warm up by a campfire in the woods. A delicious brunch will be served featuring locally made maple syrup, pancakes, and Common Ground raised eggs and bacon. Admission is $8 per person for ages 4 through adult; ages 3 and under are free. Pre-registration not required.

For directions to Common Ground New Haven Ecology Project, copy and paste the following url to your browser.

http://maps.google.com/maps?daddr=358+Springside+Avenue,+New+Haven,+CT+06515&cid=0,0,7381028234004548071&fb=1&hq=common+ground+high+school&gl=us&geocode=0,41.33936,-72.958529&t=m&z=16

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Maple Syrup Festival and Brunch
